phrases: Caviar and foie gras, truffles, lobster and shark fin spring rolls,
fried sea urchin and filet mignon...
What do your parents do for a living, Kirisaki-san?
We are just an ordinary family!
You are filthy rich, are not you?
So my lunch is not exactly ordinary.
Oh, you can just call me Ruri, Kirisaki-san.
Then can you use my first name too.
Then, you can call me Kosaki!
I was supposed to help your team at the swim meet, but I ended up getting disqualified.
I cannot fault you for doing me a favor.
I am just relieved that you were not seriously hurt, Chitoge-chan.
Even though it was for Kosaki's sake,
I am feeling more than a little bit guilty about what happened to you.
Well, there is no reason for you to feel bad, Ruri-chan.
After all, it is all that bean sprout's fault anyway.
Get this: even before the meet began,
he was already pissing me off with every little thing he said!
When I was about to drown, he even tried to surprise me in my sleep.
Seriously, he is the lowest of the low!
Kirisaki-saChitoge-chan, you mean nobody told you?
Ichijou-kun was the one who saved you in the pool.
N-No way, no way, no way, no way!
As if that wimp would have the guts!
He was pretty amazing back there.
He just dove right in to rescue you, Chitoge-chan!
So I feel bad for him when you talk about him like that.
I clobbered him twice because I had no idea.
It is not too late to apologize, and perhaps even thank him.
A-After it is been this long?
And why should I have to thank him of all people?
Thanking him is still the right thing to do.
If there is anything I can do to help, I will.
Oh, I know what you mean.
Wow, are you still worried about that?
I just thought that I should at least say something to you about it.
Do not give it another thought.
I swear I will not tell anyone.
Yup, you will not tell anyoneWait, what?
You are bothered by the fat on your stomach, right?
You did not have to personally make sure I kept my mouth shut.
I do not gossip about that sort of stuff anyway.
That is not what I am talking about!
Besides, I had not even told anyone yet, so why did you have to punch me?
That said, you probably do need to watch your waist.
You eat way too much meat, like all the time!
You need to show a little more concern for your health and eat more veg
I am going to ask you straight up!
And what are you going to do if I tell you?
How about giving him a token of apology?
You like these, do not you?
I am kind of scared now.
Well, how should I put it...
Take it as a token of gratitude for yesterday.
I prefer the coarse bean paste.
If you are just going to complain, then give it back!
What is got you so worked up?
There is something I want to say to you about yesterday!
I almost drowned in the pool, and...
I heard... that you dove right in to rescue me.
So I guess... sometimes you are actually more of a man than I thought.
I mean, you were pretty bold, and all...
What does she mean, I am bold?
I guess that also means she does not completely resent me for it.
That could not possibly be true.
I was really worried there, you know?
Thinking that you could have stopped breathing...
Was he really that worried about me?
But hey, was not that a first for you, too?
Does he mean being saved from drowning?
Yeah, it was kind of scary,
but I guess I was glad in the end.
Hey, hey, what is up with you?
Were you really okay with it being me?
As, you know... the one who...
I really could not care less who saved me.
S-Since when has she felt that way about me?!
Wait, why am I getting so nervous?
I am supposed to have feelings for Onodera!
B-But, with all those people there, it was kind of embarrassing.
So she is proud of it?
You are more venturous than I would given you credit for.
But really, I know it was for CPR, but a kiss is a kiss.
Surely it would have been better for your first time to have been a bit more romantic.
What are you going on about now?
What were you thinking, you perverted bean sprout?!
That is it, I have had enough!
I have no reason to thank the biggest moron of the century for anything!
Honestly, do these two actually get along or not?
Hey, Chitoge-chan, there is something that is been on my mind lately.
Are you and Ichijou-kun really going out?
If you have a close friend
who can keep a secret, why not tell them?
Thanks to the unique relationship and circumstances our parents are in,
we are being forced to pretend that we are dating.
Our circumstances aside, who would ever give him the time of day?
Let us say that if at some point, someone who actually does like Ichijou-kun shows up, what then?
Oh please, I would hand him over on a silver platter with a ribbon on top!
Though, that is if anyone benevolent enough to fall for that spineless bean sprout even exists!
Oh, but promise me you will not spread this to anyone, okay?
Otherwise, the entire city could be decimated.
Just what kind of family do you come from, Chitoge-chan?
I have to go check up on the animals now, so I will see you later!
You both give me your word, right?
With a ribbon on top, she said.
So what are you going to do now?
Should not you just ask him out?
If you are going to be like that, then surely next time,
somebody else could come along and take him, you know?
But this is as good a chance as I will ever have, right?
I do not want to keep feeling this way.
I am going to go for it, Ruri-chan.
I am... going to tell him how I feel!
Just thinking about it makes me blush.
Did not you just decide to go for it?
Seriously, what was her problem this afternoon?
I do not understand women at all.
Like seriously, is there any way to get her not to deck people at the drop of a hat?
My pendant's getting thrashed thanks to her.
Maybe I should put a new chain on it or something.
At this rate, it will be annihilated by the time I find the promise girl.
I wonder what she is doing these days.
It is been ten years since we made that promise.
I would not be surprised if she does not even remember it anymore.
You have got some nerve, showing up late, you perverted bean sprout.
Would you mind getting to work?
Hey, that stuff earlier, was that you trying to thank me?
Have you got a brain in your head?
I-I would never do such a thing!
Why should I have to thank you?
You are not the type to do that anyway.
Well then, why did you rescue me?
I thought you did not like me.
Of course I would still rescue you!
You are saying you would let someone drown if you did not like them?
Well, sorry, but I did not have time to even consider something so absurd!
I was running in before I knew it.
Well, I guess it is pretty clear why.
Even if we are faking it, we are still boyfriend and girlfriend.
There is probably some unknown power at work, right?
Hey, hey, are not you going to rip into me?
All right, I am going home.
I will leave the rest to you!
Come on, what did you say?
Do not just run off like that!
I did not understand a word of what she said.
But it did sound like she was thanking me.
Damn, could she be any more stubborn?
Hey, Kosaki, what is it that you like about Ichijou-kun?
I have been watching you two for years, and I still cannot figure it out.
I mean, I know that he is not a bad guy, but...
Well, the way he can be really kind, or just a really good person...
I mean, I know why I like him, but it is really hard to put into words.
How do you think I should describe it?
Onodera, Miyamoto, are you guys leaving now?
I have to be somewhere now, so I got to split.
Miyamoto took off like a rocket, huh?
I know I decided to tell him, but things are moving too fast!
Do not you dare run away.
What did she just come back for?
I never thought I would be doing this so soon.
How can I act normally now?
There is no way I can just blurt it out now!
Your face is getting pretty red.
Wh-What are you going to do?
No, I need to call for an ambulance.
You want me to calm down?
You are so hot, you must have a temperature of almost 40 degrees!
If that is the case, we need to hurry.
This is what I like about him.
All right, just sit tight for a second!
I will get you some cold medicine
I have never, ever had the courage to tell you this,
Did anyone get hurt up there?
For god's sake, would you guys watch it?
Oh, crap, someone is up there!
Onodera, I am going to go get a teacher.
Oh, be careful not to touch that glass.
What were you trying to say just now?
'Kay, I will be back in a bit.
How could something like this happen?
And I would finally mustered the courage...
It almost seemed like she was confessing.
I mean, in there alone, with those particular lines?
Not to mention how nervous she looked...
Though really, there is no way that Onodera could possibly have feelings for me, right?
It is not like I was anticipating anything that sweet!
I could not tell him after all.
Well, I had a feeling that you would chicken out anyway.
But hey, what counts is that you tried, right?
And I guess it was wrong of me to rush you like that.
But if it happens again, consider our friendship over.
You are going to put everything on the line next time.
Deep down inside, I am a little relieved that I failed.
Even though I want him to know how I feel as soon as possible,
I would be nice to keep what we have right now just a little longer.
But next time I am telling you for sure, Ichijou-kun.
Now, what am I going to do with this little trinket?
He is always talking about how important it is to him,
So I guess I will give it back to him tomorrow.
I wonder what kind of girl that loser made his promise to.
but deep down, it seems that he wants to be reunited with her.
I guess that means that even now, he still likes her.
That has nothing to do with this!
Can I just give him back his damned locket already?
I do not have time for that now.
You are the one who found it?
I was panicking, looking for it.
I only just realized it was gone.
You should be more careful, you know?
But how did I drop it?
I thought it was around my neck the whole time.
See you later, stupid bean sprout.
I guess even she is capable of being nice sometimes.
How was that locket I repaired?
Darling did not notice a thing.
Would not you want him to know, after you went through the trouble to fix it?
It is totally fine this way.
Now we are even, stupid bean sprout.
You say it is precious to you, but you keep losing it.
The girl who gave it to you would be crushed.
Did not I make a promise with a boy, when I was younger?
It almost sounds like his story.
But there is no way it is.
What was it, that he said that day?
You wanted to see me, Claude-sama?
I have been waiting for you.
This is the target for your next mission.
You probably know about about it already,
but our Mistress is currently in a relationship with this fellow.
However, I get the feeling that he is only using and deceiving her.
He is a cunning little punk.
I will not let him get away.
And on top of that, he is a short, vulgar, worthless, inconsequential wimp.
It is like he was raised by monkeys, he reeks more than a cesspool, and he is a pig with no balls.
Just thinking about him pisses me off.
Snuggling up to our Mistress, damn him!
Mistress should never be with a guy like him!
Unfortunately, I am not able to protect Mistress from him directly.
But on the other hand, you, my brilliant subordinate and protege,
should have no problem saving Mistress from the vile clutches of this little prick.
I vow that I will save Mistress.
